New Records: England conceded their biggest ever ODI total.
England fell to their biggest ever defeat in ODIs.
Key Match Events: South Africa set a target of 400 runs.
England was all out for 170, losing by 229 runs.
Reece Topley got injured during the match.
Jos Buttler admitted that bowling first was potentially a mistake.
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and chose to bowl first.
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler expressed disappointment and acknowledged the tough conditions.
Aiden Markram praised his team's all-round performance.
Matthew Mott admitted that choosing to field first was a mistake.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in extremely hot and humid conditions in Mumbai.
Reece Topley has a suspected broken finger and will not be replaced by Jofra Archer.
